patch

The list of all database patches. These are used to coordinate database migrations.

Attribute Comment Format Attributes
name  The unique key.  name
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		pk
 
installedUtcTs  The time when the patch was installed in this database.  timestamp required
 
source  The full raw script. This is used to downgrade the schema.  multiline20000
max length: 20000
allows( printable ,  whitespace ) 		required
 
installedLocalTs  ${field.f_comment}  timestamp  
installedLocalTsMessage  ${field.f_comment}  text100
max length: 100
allows( printable ) 		 
installedLocalDate  ${field.f_comment}  date  
installedLocalTime  ${field.f_comment}  time
